mapper.insert: insert into board (board_no, board_title, board_contents, board_date) values((select IFNULL(MAX(board_no),0)+1 from board a), #{title}, #{contents}, sysdate())
mapper.select: select board_no as "board_no" ,board_title as "title" ,board_contents as "contents" ,board_date as "board_date" from board
select board_no as "board_no" ,board_title as "title" ,board_contents as "contents" ,board_date as "board_date" from board where board_no=#{board_no}
mapper.update: update board set board_title=#{title}, board_contents=#{contents}, board_date=sysdate() where board_no=${board_no}
